ing: 1 (3.95 ounce) package IdahoanÂ® Au Gratin Homestyle Casserole
des: "Idahoan's Au Gratin Mexicali is a spicy twist on traditional potatoes. Add a little salsa, some cheese, and presto, you're done!"
ins:
Prepare potatoes according to directions and add salsa.
Add shredded cheese five minutes before end of bake time.
